attributes.action: Ask HM Queen Elizabeth ll to remove Theresa May as PM
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May has always been a remainer this in its self is a conflict of the interest of the people of the United Kingdom! We need a true leave prime minister who believes in the complete independence of the uk. There for I truly believe the Queen should now intervene!
attributes.background: I’m asking HM queen Elizabeth ll to remove Theresa May as our prime minister on the grounds she is intentionally subverting the will of the people of the United Kingdom in continually delaying the withdrawal from the European Union

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or to lose their job.

You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254756
